name: Lemon Bean
description: Lemon Bean is a sativa weed strain made from a genetic cross between Lemon Tree and Eddy Lepp. Lemon Bean is 21% THC, making this strain an ideal choice for experienced cannabis consumers. Leafly customers tell us Lemon Bean effects include feeling energetic, focused, and uplifted. Medical marijuana patients often choose Lemon Bean when dealing with symptoms associated with anxiety, stress, and depression. Bred by West Coast Breeders, Lemon Bean features flavors like lemon, citrus, and diesel. The dominant terpene of this strain is myrcene.
